flawed_nl_solution:
The first sister has 5 pieces of clothing because 10 / 2 = <<10/2=5>>5
The next sister had 15 pieces of clothing because 10 + 2 = <<10+2=15>>15
The three youngest sisters combined have 30 pieces because 10 + 5 + 15 = <<10+5+15=30>>30
The oldest has 10 pieces because 30 / 3 = <<30/3=10>>10
Nicole ends up with 40 pieces of clothing because 10 + 5 + 15 + 10 = <<10+5+15+10=40>>40
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
